disclaimer.banner: Clinical audit tool — All outputs require physician review — Not treatment recommendations — Image data, if uploaded, is sent to Anthropic API
label.ruleDerived: Derived from Guideline-as-Code ruleset v2 (testable, deterministic)
label.ruleDerivedAria: Derived from Guideline-as-Code ruleset v2, testable and deterministic
label.visionExtractedAria: This data was extracted from an image via AI
consent.title: IMAGE DATA DISCLOSURE
consent.body1: The uploaded image will be sent to the Anthropic API for data extraction. Image data leaves your browser and is processed by a third-party service.
consent.body2: Do NOT use real patient data. This tool is for SYNTHETIC DATA ONLY.
consent.body3: By proceeding, you confirm that the image contains only synthetic or de-identified data suitable for demonstration purposes.
